synopsis.text: Shortly after the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, Japan is hit by a series of catastrophic earthquakes, triggering a chain of mysterious natural disasters. Amidst the chaos, the Mutou family, consisting of parents Kouichirou and Mari, and their children, Ayumu and Gou, find their peaceful lives shattered. As the Japanese archipelago begins to sink, the Mutou siblings must navigate through extreme conditions, facing life-threatening challenges, and grappling with the harsh realities of loss and separation. With unwavering determination and a steadfast belief in the future, the family embarks on a perilous journey to survive against all odds, discovering the true depths of their resilience and will to live.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
